channel.title: "I Am Legend" The Runescape future of gaming
channel.description:
Project I Am Legend Server
the server will be based off the movie "I Am Legend"
Ya Ya, it sounds stupid....
but it might be pretty cool. it might take pking to a different level.
heres how it would work. it would run on a multiplayer storyline, kind of like call of duty 4 (the best game in the world untill GTA4 lol)
you will pick a side - human, or infected human
you will start in a little room with 2 portals you enter the portal you wanna join. you will never be able to change your decision, unless you restart the game. (make a new Char) teleporting will be disabled.
the whole map will become in use. if you pick human you go to one area, if you pick infected human you go to another area.
the 2 teams are enemys.
you will work your way up with your friends to take over the enemy. if this means making you own clan, so be it.
dont want anything to do with the evil or non evil? train your stats and work your way to earning rewards such as skill capes, armor, gold, and power be the best known in your town. even mabye be the town leader.
its your gaming, it should be your world.
and thats for my idea....
If you agree, hit me up with a comment, if you wanna help me create a server like this, my hotmail address is Skate_freak101@hotmail.com
[center][b]Thanks for taking the time to read this.
i can use ideas too, if you think you have a cool idea, tell me about it[/b][/center]
is it possible to get this stickied? zstars go his stickied.
[b][center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center][/b] Release Dates:
01- Server First Idea: 12-17-08 02- First Structure Of Server Including Server Base Release Date: 12-19-08 03- First Server Image Release Date: 12-20-08 03- Server Recruitment Thread Release Date: 12-20-08 04-Aproximate Closed Beta Version Release Date: Q2 Game Season 05- Aproximate Game Completion Release Date: Q4 Game Season, Q1 Game Season Of "09"
[b][center]----------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center][/b]
Game Updates:
01- Game Gets Named: 12-17-08 [b][center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center][/b]
Staff: Pancakes :p
______________Update And Release Blog______________
Today (12-17-08) the game gets named on time. thats it.
im looking for a server base, non silab for right now, ill make it silab later, a pk server that has all working stats and easy to make safe zones with, or a good nonpk server, with all working stats, and the ability to make pk areas
oh and BTW im developing this game. this isnt just an idea

item.title: "I Am Legend" The Runescape future of gaming
item.dc:creator: @Pancakes Pancakes
item.description:
@Pancakes wrote:

thats awsome, if i can get more people to say they would play im gonna start developing it. i need help though so if you know anything about private servers i can use you send me a message - skate_freak101@hotmail.com

im not on now though my brother is using my computer and im on my moms with this ugly pink mouse… lol i gotta figure out how to get silabsoft to work on this computer so he would leave mine alone…

oh and btw, if your good at private servers and know how to handle one, thats all i need.
theres all this talk about " you gotta be c++ or cc++ or c++ or whatever it is to be a dev. on my server!"

i dont even know what that means, to me, creating a private server is basic algebra (pluging things in to get your answer)

Read full topic
